description: Information about how a sequencing library was prepared.
title: Library preparation protocol
name: library_preparation_protocol

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

input_nucleic_acid_molecule.description: Starting nucleic acid molecule isolated for sequencing.

nucleic_acid_source.description: Source cells or organelles from which nucleic acid molecules were collected.
nucleic_acid_source.example: Should be one of: single cell, bulk cell, single nucleus, bulk nuclei, or mitochondria.

library_construction_method.description: The general method for sequencing library construction.

library_construction_kit.description: Name of kit used to construct the sequencing library.

nucleic_acid_conversion_kit.description: Name of kit used to convert RNA to DNA for sequencing.

end_bias.description: The type of tag or end bias the library has.
end_bias.example: Should be one of: 3 prime tag, 3 prime end bias, 5 prime tag, 5 prime end bias, or full length.
end_bias.guidelines: Enter 'full length' if there is no tag or end bias.

primer.description: Primer used for cDNA synthesis from RNA.
primer.example: Should be one of: poly-dT, or random.

strand.example: Should be one of: first, second, unstranded, or not provided.
strand.guidelines: Enter 'first' if sequenced molecule is only the strand generated during first strand synthesis. Enter 'second' if sequenced molecule is only the strand generated during second strand synthesis. Enter 'unstranded' if both strands were sequenced.

umi_barcode.description: Information about unique molecular identifier (UMI) barcodes.

library_preamplification_method.description: The method used to amplify RNA prior to adaptor ligation.

cdna_library_amplification_method.description: The method used to amplify cDNA library prior to sequencing.

nominal_length.description: Average (insert) size of the fragments being sequenced.

nominal_sdev.description: Standard deviation of the (insert) size of the fragments being sequenced.
